They're really not worth playing, just tiny tiny 'teach me' maps.  They
are in the 80s.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Marsh [mailto:danielmarsh00@...] 
Sent: Saturday, February 19, 2005 8:47 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [gladiator] Re: what else is there to do


Actually, there are some secret (if you can call them
that) levels that you can find.  The only way to get
to them is by using the option to choose exactly the
level number that you want.  I think they're in the
80-90 level range (it's been a looong time since I've
played them so I'm not sure).  It's strange that they
aren't documented because they're designed like
tutorial missions.  Oh, and if they aren't in the
80-90 level range then try 800-900 range.. I can't be
for sure certain but I remember stumbling across them
one day.  They were in the original disk based version
of the game so you might have to get that to try them.

--- alternate_dph <dph_of_rules@...> wrote:

> 
> > are there any other like secret lvls or can i
